pullrequest.title: Eliminate potential deadlock from SIGCHLD signal handler

content.raw:
This was implemented with semaphores rather than a mutex \+ condition\_variable because they are safe in signal handlers: [http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man7/signal-safety.7.html](http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man7/signal-safety.7.html)

The alternative was a spinloop with a sleep, which seemed undesirable.
